function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Suitable environmental conditions for malaria transmission, including warmer temperatures, low elevation, and intensive agriculture","Impact":"Increased risk of malaria transmission and spread in the identified areas","Mitigation":"Implement targeted vector control activities, enhance surveillance and awareness programs, and limit mosquito breeding habitats","Technologies":"Use of insecticide-treated bed nets, indoor residual spraying, and larval control measures","People":"General population living in the identified areas, public health workers","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Biological and environmental drivers of West Nile Virus (WNV) transmission, including bird and vector population densities","Impact":"Potential for sustained transmission and spillover to humans and horses","Mitigation":"Implement targeted vector control activities, enhance surveillance and awareness programs, and reduce bird and vector population densities","Technologies":"Use of insecticide spraying, mosquito traps, and bird population management techniques","People":"General population living in affected areas, public health workers, veterinary professionals","Owner":"Public health authorities, environmental organizations, veterinary agencies"}]}
